entry.title: Postgraduate Student Stories: Eric Dillon - CDH

link.title: Postgraduate Student Stories: Eric Dillon - CDH

entry.summary: What is it like to do a postgraduate degree at Cambridge Digital Humanities? We caught up with CDH alum Eric Dillon, who studied the MPhil in Digital Humanities from 2023-2024. Read about Eric's postgraduate student experience at CDH - including the skills he developed, the challenges he faced, and the growth he experienced - in
